org.walkingarchive.backend.model.card
Class CardDAO

java.lang.Object
  org.walkingarchive.backend.model.card.CardDAO

public class CardDAO
extends java.lang.Object

The Card Data Access Object is responsible for adding, retrieving, modifying, and deleting Card, Deck, and Set information from the database.

getCardsByType

public java.util.List<Card> getCardsByType(java.lang.String type,
                                           int offset)
Retrieves the Cards by type from the database. The specified offset retrieves different 'pages' of results, each page contains a maximum of 20 results

Parameters:
type - String of the type of Card to retrieve
offset - the page of results to retrieve
Returns:
List of Cards of the given type
